articles.title: Bitcoin drops 1.6% to below $20000 - Reuters
articles.description: Bitcoin was off 1.63% at $19,920 by late afternoon in Europe on Saturday, down $330 from its previous close.
articles.content:
Aug 27 (Reuters) - Bitcoin was off 1.63% at $19,920 by late afternoon in Europe on Saturday, down $330 from its previous close.
Bitcoin, the world's biggest and best-known cryptocurrency, is down 58… [+336 chars]

articles.title: Bitcoin once again slips below $20000 - Reuters
articles.description: Bitcoin on Sunday dropped 1.54% to $19,804, slipping from the 20,000 mark after losing $310 from its previous close.
articles.content:
Sept 18 (Reuters) - Bitcoin on Sunday dropped 1.54% to $19,804, slipping from the 20,000 mark after losing $310 from its previous close.

articles.title: Cryptoverse: Ether snaps at bitcoin's heels in race for crypto crown - Reuters.com
articles.description: For years, ether could barely dream of challenging its big brother bitcoin. Now, its ambitions may be becoming more realistic.
articles.content:
Sept 13 (Reuters) - For years, ether could barely dream of challenging its big brother bitcoin. Now, its ambitions may be becoming more realistic.

articles.title: Ethereum Merge: How one big cryptocurrency is going green
articles.description: Ethereum, which currently uses as much energy as a medium-sized country, is to halt cryptomining.
articles.content:
By Joe TidyCyber reporter 
The second biggest cryptocurrency, Ethereum, is about to switch over to a new operating model that uses 99.9% less energy.
